long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Defiway: Your Gateway to Decentralized Finance!

Embark on a seamless journey into the decentralized financial world with Defiway, our cutting-edge Web3 wallet extension. Your all-in-one solution for secure access to decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, Defiway empowers you to effortlessly manage your digital assets. Experience a user-friendly interface paired with robust security features, making trading, lending, and engaging in decentralized exchanges a frictionless and private affair.

Key Features:

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate DeFi applications with ease.
Robust Security: Your assets are safeguarded with top-notch security features.
Seamless Transactions: Trade, lend, and exchange assets effortlessly.
Privacy: Enjoy a private and secure DeFi experience.

Additional Tokens: Effortlessly manage various tokens across supported networks.
Elevate your DeFi journey with Defiway — where convenience meets the future of finance. Download our extension from the web store now and unlock the full potential of decentralized finance at your fingertips!

What's new?:

- Add BITCOIN provider for bitcoin DApps
long.ru:
Introducing Defiway: Your Gateway to Decentralized Finance!

Embark on a seamless journey into the decentralized financial world with Defiway, our cutting-edge Web3 wallet extension. Your all-in-one solution for secure access to decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, Defiway empowers you to effortlessly manage your digital assets. Experience a user-friendly interface paired with robust security features, making trading, lending, and engaging in decentralized exchanges a frictionless and private affair.

Key Features:

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate DeFi applications with ease.
Robust Security: Your assets are safeguarded with top-notch security features.
Seamless Transactions: Trade, lend, and exchange assets effortlessly.
Privacy: Enjoy a private and secure DeFi experience.

Supported Chains for Bridge:

Ethereum
Tron
Polygon
BSC
Bitcoin
Arbitrum
Base
Avalanche
Cronos
Optimism

Supported Tokens:

USDT
USDC
BTC
ETH

Additional Tokens: Effortlessly manage various tokens across supported networks.
Elevate your DeFi journey with Defiway — where convenience meets the future of finance. Download our extension from the web store now and unlock the full potential of decentralized finance at your fingertips!
